title: Ep 128 | Will GOP FINALLY Grow a Spine & WIN? | Jim Jordan | The Glenn Beck Podcast
description:
The Left has total control, and nobody wants to speak up. Luckily, Rep. Jim Jordan is willing to stand in their way. On this episode of "The Glenn Beck Podcast," Rep. Jordan talks to Glenn about the FBI, the swamp, the First Amendment, the Freedom Caucus, why he changed his mind on FISA, and his new book, “Do What You Said You Would Do.” What’s going to happen to Roe v. Wade? How much damage will Joe Biden do with his presidency? Are Republicans ready to grow a backbone? Is four years enough time to flush our deep state? Rep. Jordan also defends his near-perfect conservative voting score and dispenses some wisdom: “If the Left aren’t saying anything about you, you ain’t doing any good.”  

Sponsor:

Pre-born has a passion to save unborn babies from abortion and to see women come to Christ. Over the past 15 years, Pre-born centers have counseled over 340,000 women considering abortion, more than 169,000 babies have been saved, and over 51,000 women have surrendered their lives to Christ. To donate, dial pound 250 and say keyword “BABY” that’s pound 250, BABY, or go to preborn.com/glenn. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
